title: Mental
overview: Nico is a 16-year-old girl who has a chaos in her head in which she can no longer orient herself made up of anxiety attacks, visions and voices that speak to her. After a hallucinatory episode, she is taken into a psychiatric clinic with the diagnosis of schizophrenia and there she meets Michele, Emma and Daniel. The four kids team up and together face a difficult but fundamental path towards self-knowledge and acceptance.Â
